name: Life of Snowbal
description:
Drunk Tractor Games

Team:

Vladislav Zaynev - Pulmanoria.itch.io (vladzaynev@gmail.com)

Ivan Markin - kais-viorla.itch.io  (kaisviorla@gmail.com)

Anna Makovei - https://www.artstation.com/barcode  (makovei@bk.ru)

Control:

WASD - move 

SPACE - jump You play as a snowball.

Your task is to get to the exit of the level without melting.

Snow is constantly sticking to you, making you bigger and faster, but by becoming very large you can get stuck in the aisle or just not go through an obstacle.

You can melt the snow near the fires, but do not stay near them otherwise you will melt.

Try to complete the level faster. Spring follows right behind you and if you do not have time to reach the exit, spring will melt you.
